name: The Perfect Sniper
description: The Romano family has taken over the city. Corrupt politicians and police agencies do nothing to stop them. Become the morally ambiguous champion this city needs as a Sniper in Virtual Reality.
minimum_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i5-4590 Equivalent or Greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Equivalent or Greater Storage: 4 GB available space
